description: This file declares internal API functions for the Slap Sco Collection Object used in Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It includes function prototypes for collection operations such as getting count, retrieving, and setting items by handle or index.

methods.name: SlapScoColGetCount
methods.description: Returns the number of items in the collection.

methods.name: SlapScoColGetItem
methods.description: Retrieves an item from the collection based on provided parameters.

methods.name: SlapScoColSetItem
methods.description: Sets or updates an item in the collection based on provided parameters.

methods.name: SlapScoColGetItemByIndex
methods.description: Retrieves an item from the collection by its index.

methods.name: SlapScoColSetItemByIndex
methods.description: Sets or updates an item at a specific index in the collection.
